text: Sandra Kay "Sandy" Duncan (born February 20, 1946) is an American singer, songwriter and actress. She starred in many television programs and movies. She has also been doing stage acting during her career. Sandy starred in the television sitcom The Hogan Family. She was born in Henderson, Texas. Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:Singers from Texas Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Sandy Duncan
